channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 通用大西洋公司同意收购资产管理公司 Partners Capital 500 亿美元的股份
item.description: General Atlantic agrees to buy a stake in Partners Capital, a $50 billion asset manager trib.al/Qw3YW17

item.title: 从远处看，中国恒大具备进行不良债权交易的一切条件。但美国和欧洲对冲基金得到的却是一个残酷的教训：试图与共产党讨价还价是危险的
item.description: From afar, China Evergrande had all the makings of a killer distressed-debt trade. What US and European hedge funds got instead is a harsh lesson in the dangers of trying to bargain with the Communist Party trib.al/xeAWcmI

item.title: 今天是墨西哥和秘鲁的利率决定日--值得期待
item.description: It's rate decision day in Mexico and Peru — here's what to expect trib.al/b4iSc5T

item.title: 塞尔维亚将借贷成本稳定在近九年的高位，因为即使通胀率从去年的峰值继续放缓，但仍高于目标值
item.description: Serbia held borrowing costs steady at an almost nine-year high as inflation remains above target even as it continues to slow from a peak last year trib.al/1fCf9t9

item.title: 在过去的 30 年里，医疗保险的费用越来越高，从美国人的口袋里掏钱。今天的《预测》将为您详细介绍。
item.description: Health insurance has cost more and more over the past 30 years, taking money out of Americans' pockets. Get the details in today's Prognosis. trib.al/iqWBQQz

item.title: 一项专家调查显示，欧洲经济因地缘政治冲突和能源成本上升而面临更大的衰退风险。
item.description: European economies received a poor bill of health in a survey of experts that showed elevated recession risks due to geopolitical conflicts and heightened energy costs trib.al/5IX1wXG

item.title: 美国通胀数据大幅修正的风险令政策制定者和投资者惶恐不安
item.description: The risk of a big US inflation data revision is putting policymakers and investors on edge trib.al/Iq45gpO

item.title: 印度正在寻求结束对电子贸易征税的冻结，此举将允许对从软件下载到视频游戏的任何产品征收关税。
item.description: India is seeking to end a freeze on countries taxing electronic trade, a move that would allow tariffs to be imposed on anything from software downloads to video games trib.al/shz5CH7

item.title: Petronet 首席执行官 Akshay Kumar Singh 表示，由于印度对液化天然气的需求预计将扩大，因此 Petronet 希望签署更多长期液化天然气供应合同。
item.description: Petronet is looking to sign more long-term liquefied natural gas supply contracts, said Chief Executive Officer Akshay Kumar Singh, as Indian demand for the fuel is slated to expand trib.al/nh2somX

item.title: 由于高利率和更严格的监管对房东造成压力，2023 年最后一个季度，英国购房出租抵押贷款的拖欠数量激增了 18%。
item.description: The number of UK buy-to-let mortgages falling into arrears surged 18% in the final quarter of 2023 as high interest rates and stricter regulation weighed on landlords trib.al/xGBsQ9B

item.title: 中国为阻止 7 万亿美元的股市暴跌所做的努力唤起了人们对 2015 年的回忆，当时中国政府采取了严厉措施阻止股市暴跌。这次能成功吗？
item.description: China’s efforts to arrest a $7 trillion stock market rout are evoking memories from 2015, when Beijing took drastic steps to stem a crash. Can it work this time? trib.al/AUMgFOU

item.title: 生育率下降意味着尿布不再只是婴儿的专利
item.description: Lagging fertility rate means diapers aren’t just for babies anymore trib.al/cdbVhcX

item.title: 菲律宾财政部长拉尔夫-雷克托（Ralph Recto）表示，菲律宾央行未来可能会借鉴美联储的宽松货币政策，他认为当前的关键利率 "足够高"。
item.description: The Philippine central bank will likely take its cue on future monetary policy easing from the Federal Reserve, according to Finance Secretary Ralph Recto, who says the current key rate is “high enough” trib.al/JjeoHbp

item.title: 消息人士称，NatWest 已裁减其新加坡外汇交易和销售团队的人员
item.description: NatWest has chopped the ranks of its foreign-exchange trading and sales team in Singapore, sources say trib.al/fO5Cqn3

item.title: 法国政府将为企业提供 20 亿欧元（22 亿美元）的贷款担保，用于投资适应气候变化。
item.description: The French state will guarantee €2 billion ($2.2 billion) of loans for companies to invest in adapting to climate change trib.al/lLDbNPL

item.title: 巴布亚新几内亚总理詹姆斯-马拉佩（James Marape）在堪培拉议会联席会议上发表讲话时，加倍强调了巴布亚新几内亚与澳大利亚的经济和安全关系。
item.description: Papua New Guinea Prime Minister James Marape has doubled down on his country’s economic and security ties with Australia as he became the first Pacific leader to address a joint sitting of the parliament in Canberra trib.al/hPXXsPR

item.title: 冰岛又一次火山爆发，地点靠近一个已经遭到破坏的渔镇和该国的顶级旅游景点蓝湖温泉
item.description: Another volcanic eruption starts in Iceland close to an already damaged fishing town and the country’s top tourist attraction, the Blue Lagoon spa trib.al/uPXnd2g

item.title: 达索工业集团的亿万富豪继承人任命其集团航空部门的负责人监管其持有的股份
item.description: The billionaire heirs to the Dassault industrial fortune name the head of their conglomerate’s aviation arm to oversee their holdings trib.al/4T0n0Tk

item.title: 亿万富翁莱诺德-盖格（Reinold Geiger）正再次推动全球化妆品公司欧舒丹的私有化，这是继任者计划正在进行中的最强烈迹象。
item.description: Billionaire Reinold Geiger is making a renewed push to take global cosmetics firm L’Occitan private, the strongest indication yet that a succession plan is underway trib.al/dhCd6w2

item.title: 纽约社区银行的多户问题
item.description: The multi-family problems at New York Community Bancorp trib.al/14EwYaB

item.title: 中国大宗商品行业正步入农历新年假期，经济通缩根深蒂固，市场供过于求
item.description: China's commodities sector is heading into the Lunar New Year break on a glum note, with deflation embedded in the economy and markets looking oversupplied trib.al/AY53Zmr

item.title: 日本央行一位高级官员表示，即使在负利率结束后，也很难看到日本央行持续、快速地提高政策利率
item.description: A top Bank of Japan official said it’s hard to see the bank raising its policy rate continuously and rapidly even after the negative interest rate is ended trib.al/Vyd464v

item.title: 消息人士称，复星集团在出售香港山顶再保险公司的计划失败后，重新启动了这一计划
item.description: Fosun has revived a plan to sell Hong Kong-based Peak Reinsurance after failing on a previous attempt, sources say trib.al/xGWn1OY

item.title: 中国上月消费价格创下全球金融危机以来最快降幅，世界第二大经济体正努力摆脱持续通货紧缩的压力
item.description: China’s consumer prices fell last month at the fastest pace since the global financial crisis as the world’s second-largest economy struggles to shake off persistent deflation pressures trib.al/1KZZ5Ym

item.title: 中国政府出人意料地撤换了证券监管机构的负责人，从而表明了阻止 7 万亿美元股市崩盘的坚定决心，此后中国股市上涨。
item.description: Chinese shares gained after authorities signaled a stronger resolve to stem a $7 trillion rout via a surprise move to replace the head of the country’s securities regulator trib.al/0rXsaP4

item.title: 贝莱德（BlackRock）表示，当日本央行结束负利率和美联储削减借贷成本时，金融市场将面临比许多人预期更大的波动风险。
item.description: Financial markets are at risk of more volatility than many people expect when the the Bank of Japan ends its negative interest rate and the Federal Reserve cuts borrowing costs, according to BlackRock trib.al/UHgE9er

item.title: 美国国会预算办公室称，移民人数的激增将在未来十年内通过扩大劳动力和增加需求，帮助美国经济增长约 7 万亿美元。
item.description: The surge in immigration will help bolster the US economy by about $7 trillion over the next decade by swelling the labor force and increasing demand, the Congressional Budget Office says trib.al/tLjWspR

item.title: 几周来，中国主要证券监管机构的工作人员一直在夜以继日地研究如何支撑中国跌跌不休的股市，而这一重磅炸弹就这样降临了
item.description: Staffers at China’s main securities regulator had been working around the clock for weeks on ways to prop up the nation’s tumbling stock market when the bombshell dropped trib.al/uxdsCwu

item.title: 自中国政府禁止比特币行业以来，中国的比特币矿工们辗转于各个国家。现在，他们在埃塞俄比亚找到了新的避风港
item.description: Chinese Bitcoin miners have bounced from country to country since Beijing banned the industry. Now they've found a new haven in Ethiopia trib.al/7bKf3No

item.title: 在过去三年里，量化对冲基金的计算机模型帮助它们超越了竞争对手基金的人类交易员。
item.description: China’s deepening stock-market slump is even taking its toll on quantitative hedge funds, whose computer models have helped them outperform human traders at rival funds for the past three years trib.al/8gdiFk7
